name: Sweet-Sour Macerated Cherries With Marcona Almonds, Mint, and Ricotta
description: Cherry season is fleeting, so let's make the most of it while it's here. To make this incredibly easy dish, macerate fresh cherries in a sweet-sour mixture of honey and red wine vinegar, top them off with black pepper, then serve them with ricotta cheese, crushed Marcona almonds, and mint.
recipeYield: Serves 4 as a light breakfast or dessert
recipeIngredient: 1 pint sweet cherries, halved and pitted
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/2 cup Marcona almonds, roughly crushed (see note)

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, toss together cherries, honey, and vinegar. Season with salt and a generous grating of pepper.

Spoon ricotta cheese into bowls (alternatively, spread it on toasted bread). Top with cherries and the macerating liquid, crushed almonds, and mint leaves. Sprinkle with flaky salt, if using, and serve.
